action.action-desc: Mr. Smith of New Jersey (for himself, Ms. McCollum, Mr. Royce of California, Mr. Engel, Mr. Austin Scott of Georgia, Ms. Bass, Mr. Fortenberry, Mr. McGovern, Mr. Paulsen, Ms. DeLauro, Mr. Reichert, Mr. Smith of Washington, and Mr. Cicilline) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To reauthorize the Global Food Security Act of 2016, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Global Food Security Reauthorization Act of 2018.

section.header: Amendments to the Global Food Security Act

subsection.text: Section 3(a)(6) of the Global Food Security Act of 2016 (22 U.S.C. 9302(a)(6)) is amended by inserting deworming programs, after diet diversification,.
Section 4(7) of such Act (22 U.S.C. 9303(7)) is amended by inserting the Inter-American Foundation, after the United States Africa Development Foundation,.

subsection.header: Authorization of appropriations To implement global food security strategy
subsection.text: Section 6(b) of such Act (22 U.S.C. 9305(b)) is amended by striking fiscal years 2017 and 2018 and inserting fiscal years 2017 through 2021.
The matter preceding section 8(a)(1) of such Act (22 U.S.C. 9307(a)(1)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by striking Not later than 1 year and 2 years after the date of the submission of the strategy required under section 5(c), and inserting Not later than September 30, 2018, and annually thereafter through 2021,; and
by striking for 2017 and 2018 and inserting for the preceding fiscal year.

section.header: Amendment to the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961
section.text: Section 492(a) of the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 (22 U.S.C. 2292a(a)) is amended by striking fiscal years 2017 and 2018 and inserting fiscal years 2017 through 2021.
